homeSubTitle: Enjoy your favorite dishes without leaving your home. Relish delicious meals delivered straight to your doorstep for effortless indulgence. Order now and savor the best of cuisine, comfortably from your own home.

freeDelivery.title: Free Delivery 24/7
freeDelivery.description: Free delivery for all orders over €100.

renownedChef.title: Renowned Chef
renownedChef.description: Dishes crafted by an award-winning chef.

freshFood.title: Fresh and Healthy Ingredients
freshFood.description: Fresh, balanced ingredients brought to your table.

aboutDescription:
In her kitchen, she doesn’t just prepare meals;
she creates stories, memories, and a sense of
belonging. Every recipe is an invitation to explore
unforgettable flavors and share precious moments
around the table.
loginDescription: Creating an account allows you to order faster, save multiple addresses, track your orders, and more. Log in now to access these benefits.

menuDescription: Come and explore a delicious menu where every dish is an invitation to indulgence. Discover our recipes, pick your favorites, and enjoy in no time!
